member.name: T:LJCAppManager.Program
member.remarks:
These tabs display the data items and related data. -- Project Level Remarks The User forms/classes.
These forms/classes manage the User data. They include: UserModule , UserDetail, ProgramList, ProgramDetail, ModuleList and ModuleDetail. Plugin Members

member.name: M:LJCAppManager.ProgramReference.#ctor
member.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

member.name: M:LJCAppManager.ProgramReference.CompareTo(LJCAppManager.ProgramReference)
member.returns: The integer that indicates the order relationship of the objects.
member.remarks:
A negative integer - This instance precedes the compare-to object.
Zero - This instance and the compare-to object have the same position.
A postive integer - This instance follows the compare-to object.
